prompt: A professional TV studio scene with one male host and two female guests engaged in a formal discussion. The host, in a navy-blue suit, stands in the center holding a microphone. The guest on his left, in a red blouse, speaks confidently, while the guest on his right, in a white suit, listens attentively. The background features soft lighting and an audience in the studio.

tts_audio.text: (s1) Thank you for inviting me to the discussion. (s2) It’s our pleasure to have you here today. (s3) I’m glad to be part of this conversation as well. (s2) Today we’ll focus on professional growth and innovation. (s1) That’s an important topic in today’s world. (s3) Indeed, adapting to change is essential for success.
